price: Na ama aliye amini na akatenda mema basi atapata malipo mazuri. Nasi tutamwambia lilio jepesi katika amri yetu.
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلَهُۥ جَزَآءً ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۖ وَسَنَقُولُ لَهُۥ مِنۡ أَمۡرِنَا يُسۡرٗا
footnotes: Na ama mwenye kumuitikia, na akamuamini Mola wake Mlezi, na akatenda mema, basi atapata malipo mazuri Akhera, na hapa duniani tunamchukulia kwa upole na wepesi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man āmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan falahu jazāan al-ḥus'nā wasanaqūlu lahu min amrinā yus'ran
